subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Danny Brière scored the only goal in a shootout Saturday night for the Flyers, who rallied twice in the third period before escaping with a 4-3 victory over the Islanders.
snippet: Danny Brière scored the only goal in a shootout Saturday night for the Flyers, who rallied twice in the third period before escaping with a 4-3 victory over the Islanders.
